name: Hunt Planet Bug
description:
FPS game, with 2 levels of difficulty, and with four scenes. you will have to hunt animals from another planet and prevent them from hunting you ati. in the final scene you will have to arrive
An enemy ship to destroy it.

You have been granted a permit to hunt on planet bug 513. have fun hunting
animals from another planet and prevent them from eating you. we are in gerra with other planets
and one of their ships is on this planet. In the final scene you will have to reach the
spaceship to destroy it. luck.

The game has 4 scenes. scene 1: you will have to reach the cave door and along the way
You can hunt many animals, which will undoubtedly try to eat you.
scene 2: you will have to cross the cave and do not get lost, also with animals to hunt.
scene 3: you will have to reach the stairway of the great mountain where the ship has fallen
You space enemy. there will be ruins and animals to hunt.
Scene 4: On the big mountain you will have to reach the enemy spaceship to destroy it
Along the way there will be enemy robots that will attack you.
